snippet.title: Dead in Vinland - Nintendo Switch announcement trailer
snippet.description:
The Viking themed survival management sim Dead in Vinland is coming to #NintendoSwitch in Q2 2019!

Alongside this news, the major DLC “The Battle of the Heodenings" is released for the PC version today, adding a new ‘sandboxy’ endless mode!

Get the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/573120/Dead_In_Vinland/

Follow Dead in Vinland on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/deadingames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/deadingames

Follow Playdius Games on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlaydiusGames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlaydiusGames
